channel.title: java on 飞雷神

item.title: First
item.description: hello hugo 第一篇文章 public class BSearch { public static int searchIndex(int[] a, int begin, int end, int value) { if (begin > end) return -1; int middlePoint = begin + (end - begin) / 2; if (a[middlePoint] == value) { return middlePoint; } else if (a[middlePoint] > value) { return searchIndex(a, begin, middlePoint - 1, value); } else { return searchIndex(a, middlePoint + 1, end, value); } } /** * 查找数组中第一个出现的value * * @param a * @param value * @return */ public static int bsearch2(int[] a, int begin, int end, int value) { if (begin > end) return -1; int mid = begin + (end - begin) / 2; if (a[mid] > value) { return bsearch2(a, begin, mid - 1, value); } else if (a[mid] < value) { return bsearch2(a, mid + 1, end, value); } else { if (mid == 0 || a[mid - 1] !
